metadata.title: CVE-2018-25045 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Django REST framework (aka django-rest-framework) before 3.9.1 allows XSSbecause the default DRF Browsable API view templates disable autoescaping.

criterions.comment: djangorestframework: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
